NSTW in CAR goes virtual!

Together, let us be informed of the technologies and the DOSTs initiatives in keeping abreast with the fast-changing environment and challenges beyond COVID-19. Join us bring science for the people.

Welcome to all and God bless everyone.

Nancy A. Bantog

Regional Director

Metals Innovation Center on Equipment Fabrication for the Inventors and Innovators of the CAR

Metals and Engineering Innovation Center in CAR, Region I, II, III and X

METALS AND ENGINEERING INNOVATION CENTER IN CAR, REGION I, II, III and X

The metals and engineering innovation center in CAR, Region I, II, III and X was established to enable the SUCs to design and fabricate machineries and equipment, supporting the requirements of the agricultural and industrial companies in the regions.

The project will essentially involve the establishment of University-based Innovation Centers with complementary facilities according to the universitys field of specialization. The proposed Centers would enhance classroom and field-learning opportunities for students across the campus, encourage interdisciplinary scholarly research, publication, intellectual property and be a resource for the university as it evolves its role in innovation, creativity, entrepreneurship, technology commercialization and regional technological and economic development.

These Centers will also serve as venues for the strong industry-academe collaboration in the conduct of research and development of new products to be offered in existing or new markets.
